original_text: and sent his servants to call those who were invited to the wedding feast, but they would not come.
korean_text: 그 종들을 보내어 그 청한 사람들을 혼인 잔치에 오라 하였더니 오기를 싫어하거늘

sentences.original_text: and sent his servants to call those
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 종들을 보내어 그들을 불렀다

sentences.original_text: who were invited to the wedding feast
